category.name: Configuration.Reports
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: QRY_Audit_-_Organization_Logs_SortOrders
preference.preference_description: Specifies the sequence of the order by attributes which are used to sort the saved query "Audit - Organization Logs". Valid value is 1(default value) or any other integer which specifies the sequence of the particular attribute used for sorting. The default value is to sort the results based on the property "fnd0LoggedDate".
